title: What are some educational resources for router settings? - Quora

response.answer_text: Set up a strong password. Use WPA2 encryption on the wireless connection. Whitelist all the MAC addresses you want connected. Limit the DHCP server to the number of devices you’re going to connect plus the gateway (usually ending in ‘1’). At that point, you’ll be better set up than about 99% of private routers in the country.
